Cryptocurrency Exchange | Backend Ruby on Rails Developer | Remote | Full-time | https://coinfalcon.com

We are soon to be launching out no fee cryptocurrency exchange to make buying and selling cryptocurrency of all sorts as easy and cheap as possible. Our mission is to put the future of money in the pockets of the world and create global stock exchange of the future as a byproduct.

Buzzwords: Rails, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Blockchain, ICO

Must have:

  - 4+ years of hands-on experience
  - Ability to learn quickly new stacks and technologies
  - Top tier pedigree
Bonus points:

  - Strong maths
  - Degree or PhD (CS or similar fields)
  - Asia Timezone
  - Experience with bitcoin/crypto
Perks:

  - 100% remote position
  - 40h/week organised as you prefer
  - High output team
If you are interested send me your CV jordan@coinfalcon.com
